## Training a segmentation model

- Model trained to perform automatic segmentation [**from annotated examples**]{.orange}. 
- [**Requirements**]{.orange}:
    - [**Collection**]{.blue2} of satellite images
    - [**Production of annotations**]{.blue2} (building footprints or land cover if available)
- Model learns to reproduce annotations from images, with the goal to [**generalize**]{.orange} to new images

## Model used

- [**Model architecture**]{.orange}:
    - [**Backbone**]{.blue2}: Segformer ([**MiT**]{.green2})
    - [**Encoder**]{.blue2}: [**Transformer-based**]{.green2} (efficient self-attention, no positional encoding)  
    - [**Decoder**]{.blue2}: Lightweight [**MLP head**]{.green2}

- [**Why SegFormer?**]{.orange}:
    
    ✔ [**No complex decoders**]{.blue2} → Efficient & scalable  
    ✔ [**Captures local & global context**]{.blue2} → Good performance  
    ✔ [**No positional embeddings**]{.blue2} → Better generalization across resolutions  

- [**Fine tuning**]{.orange} on our images
